name: Laid to Rest
oracle_text:
Whenever a Human you control dies, draw a card.

—Vesna, Dawnhart witch

name: Cemetery Prowler
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Cemetery Prowler enters the battlefield or attacks, exile a card from a graveyard.

name: Retrieve
oracle_text: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Retrieve.
flavor_text: The roots preserved the armor for a hundred years, safeguarding it for a traveler in need.

name: Diver Skaab
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Whenever Diver Skaab exploits a creature, target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor_text: It doesn't need to breathe, but the suit does help keep the parts together.

name: "Phantom Elemental"
oracle_text:
"Phantom Elemental" enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to "Phantom Elemental" while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from "Phantom Elemental". When one or more counts are removed from "Phantom Elemental" this way, it deals that much damage to any target.

name: "Ollenblock Escort"
oracle_text:

Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
